metadata.title: CVE-2019-20167 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0 and 0.9.0-development-20191109. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function senc_Parse() in isomedia/box_code_drm.c.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
